publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2901 Michael Russell: Freelance Photographers and The Scotsman Publications Limited-That the Parliament notes the present dispute between freelance photographers and The Scotsman Publications Limited; regrets that in an age of global media The Scotsman Publications Limited and others seem determined to impose unfair trading conditions on workers whose flexibility and independence is a key component of success in the information market, and calls upon The Scotsman Publications Limited to come to a negotiated settlement in order to encourage a diverse and vibrant freelance photographic sector in Scottish publishing.
S1M-2901 Freelance Photographers and The Scotsman Publications Limited (lodged on 13 March 2002) Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*
